title: Utorrent  2.2.1 - Build 25110.exe (recommended)  ak torrent
description:
Here we go 
At present I have over 3000 torrents working in this. I decided to make a torrent out of it cause sometimes going to any of the sites that advertise this you have to go through a gauntlet of BS and ad/malware to try to get it. At least from here, if you get music from me you know my torrents are clean and I am a trusted uploader at many popular indexes. And just like the music I upload this is what I like, and use every day, In fact even as I type its busy giving the peeps the music I love.

(Problems with magnets links and Bloatware are fixed by downgrading your torrent client to utorrent 2.2.1!)

What can I say Im a music uploader, and I have had to answer some different questions from the peeps.

Well a few of the most common ones are: What torrent client is best?
And which one do you use?
Along with who is favorite band, that's the tough one ,there are so many great bands, but for torrent client that's easy cause there is only one.

Well this is the answer to two of those questions: utorrent 2.2.1

And its the same answer that you will get from most of your serious uploaders.
It don't crash often and it can handle a massive amount of torrent activity.

Both uploading and dcwnloading.

I have run it at its limit just so I could know how far I could take it. And it went A lot farther than the designers ever envisioned. They created the best. And just look at every POS that has followed. They cant make it any better and jam it with bloatware. They cant even match it. I used some of the 3. versions and all that did for me was freeze or crash constantly.
Im sure my Hdd was made dead from that. (It was)
Since then reinstalled 2.2.1 I have had no more problems with disk overload/freeze/crash.

It can handle a prolonged load without problems anywhere from 700-1000 active torrents.

I don't recommend a new user to try that.
And most will never go past 20-50.

Its not a media center, This is the best torrent client for sharing, it is the tool of the filesharing trade.
If you want a MC get one.
This is a torrent client, It will allow you to play the finished torrents.
And if you have good enough speed you can stream music or videos.


Anyway I have posted this, get it if you want.
Just ask anyone that knows and this or one of the other builds from the 2,0 series are the answer and No, this one did not and does not have the advertising that came in the 3. models and up. And nobody is mining anything...ugh!
image
Enough, get it already, and one more piece of advice: bitcomet is not the one Avoid it.

and you will avoid the problems that are endlessly irritating those who don't.

Enjoy and seed if ya want. WAIT! Just one last thing, that ad that says upgrade your torrant client. That's incorrect.
This is the answer. So trouble with magnet links and torrenting? Downgrade that piece of bloatware and go with 2.2.1(recommended)
Any questions will be addressed. But I don't expect many cause this lil client is the one I use at all the indexes I share with.....
